newsitem.title: INDIA: India Reliance up 10 pct before results.
newsitem.headline: India Reliance up 10 pct before results.

text.p: Shares of India's largest private firm Reliance Industries jumped 27.75 rupees, or 9.9 percent, to a provisional close of 307.75 on the Bombay bourse on Monday, traders said.
Reliance is expected to announce results for the financial year ended March 31, 1997 on Tuesday and most analysts have forecast the firm's net will fall below the previous year.

But traders said speculators were active in the stock, which attracted higher annualised carry forward charges of about 8.80 rupees per share on Saturday as it entered a no-delivery period on the Bombay bourse.
A no-delivery period allows speculators to buy the stock without taking delivery for about a month.
